articles.author: Adam Starkey
articles.title: Next James Bond film will be a "reinvention", says producer - NME
articles.description: Christopher Nolan is reported to be in talks to direct
articles.content:
James Bond producers have shared an update on the next instalment, saying they are planning on “reinventing” the franchise.
Speaking in an interview with The Guardian, producer Barbara Broccoli expl… [+1549 chars]
